reviewText:
This is wroth the money and time to watch this!!!!
Very please, and all train lover will be also, Most PPR fans. See the old golden days again.

This is a very good DVD describing the history of the Pennsylvania. There is a lot of early film footage, and some of it shows it's age. Some parts of it aren't as clear as new footage would be, but a lot of it was taken 60 or 70 years ago. For a railroad fan, this should be in your collection.

I love to watch train videos - This is vintage footage of Pennsylvania Rail Road.  I am a New York Central rail fan but still enjoyed this video.  Great shots of GG1's. You can never go wrong with Pentrex Videos.
